main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed for approximately 5 minutes at Ashiya, Japan, moving in a straight line overhead at an estimated speed of 600-700 mph.
interesting points: The object was directly overhead and appeared bright,The object was reported to have no trail, exhaust or sound when observed,It accelerated rapidly before disappearing from view,The object hovered for a few minutes during the sighting,Multiple military personnel confirmed the sighting with similar descriptions.
witness description: military personnel observing from the Ashiya Air Base
